author: Chris Rinearson
comment: Wish this had worked, seems like a decent watch face. Can see the app on my phone, but not in Android Wear, the settings don't stay set in the app, and it doesnt ever shiw up not on the watch. Restarted both, resynced the apps, nothing.  Guess that's why there's a refund button.  Read some of the previous responses and got it resolved. Very nice watch face.  You might want to fix that installation process though.
title: Never showed up...

author: Michael Jordan Jr.
comment: But sometimes to get quality you have to put out that money! This watch face is modern, elegant and informative! It's customizable and clean! Numbers are clear and the app does little to nothing to the battery. Highly recommend and look forward to future updates! 🙋
title: Everyone loves free

author: Michael Pickles
comment: Tried loads of faces think this one's a keeper.  One thing I miss is watch battery meter. Could you add that as a option to the bottom right? I'm using a Sony smartwatch 3 and theres loads of space there.
title: Nice and clean

author: Dominic Clouse
comment: I really like this watch design.  I thought I had battery problems with it but it seems to have resolved.  After using some other faces, the only things I would say this face needs are maybe some options for battery notifications in the top corners.

reply.author: Eric Thiebaut-George
reply.content: This is very odd. I set it to 15 minutes interval and at the end of a day (18 hours) I still have 50-60% battery left on my Moto360. Are you still experiencing this issue?

title: Good watch face.

author: Bradford Stokes
comment: This is by far the best watch face  for battery longevity. All the others kill me LG G watch in 8 hrs.  This watch face will last two days. Also the dev is super responsive to emails.
title: Awesome, saves your battery

author: Louis Eisen
comment: This watch face is great. It's simple, quick to change settings, and easy to read. Only gripe would be no built in step counter or battery amount, but those would probably clutter the screen to much.
title: Always coming back to this one.

author: Michael Ewen
comment: Hands down the best watch face for Android wear... Annoying to see it in my app drawer everyday though... Would easily be a 5/5 if it didn't have a stand alone app to modify the watch face and worked like every other watch face.
title: Best Watch Face... Annoying App

author: Dan K
comment: Moto, sony, LG need to spend more than 4 seconds on watch face design. Abysmal. They need to hire this guy.
title: Way better than stock

author: William Garrison
comment: Really nice-looking watch face, very much worth the price. Minor complaints: it could be a bit more configurable (a more flexible date format setting; choosing whether notifications, weather, etc. are shown in ambient mode; option to show battery percentage), and it includes a launcher icon even though the design guidelines specify that watch faces should not. Overall though, great watch face.

author: Ricky Thunell
comment: It has a lot of weird problems getting instslled, but if it eventually shows up on your watch it is a beautiful watch face.

reply.author: Eric Thiebaut-George
reply.content: Sometimes Android Wear gets lost in updating the watch. Try installing another watch face - it usually installs all pending watch faces.

title: Beautiful watch face. Weird install.

author: Patrick Tam
comment: It needs to be more customizable. I would love to be able to see my phone battery and watch battery from watch face. I  also wish I could turn weather off if I don't need it, usually I turn my phone/Bluetooth off so my watch is offline most of the day.

reply.author: Eric Thiebaut-George
reply.content: There is already a dark theme. I could make another option with the bottom being dark too, I'll look at that. It makes it less Material though :-(.

title: I use this daily but..

author: Uncle Buck
comment: I love this watch face... Simple, useful, tasteful. I am only missing one feature, battery percentage, if you could please add this feature, this would be the perfect watch face, for me at least. Also, is there a way to have the background black on dark theme, but with the weather information in color? That would be great as well.
title: Beautiful!!

author: Harlan Harris
comment: the kerning of the time needs work. on a Moto 360, the am/pm indicator bumps the side of the screen
title: nice, but needs polish

author: Josh Jacobs
comment: For the love of god, please add manual location settings for weather! Ya killing me smalls
title: Good but

author: Andrew Velez
comment: Great design but does not show up on my Gear Live version 5.0.2. I've done all that was posted to install but to no avail.

author: Mark Fairless
comment: but doesn't quite look right on the 42 mm Moto 360 2. The weather icon isn't centered with the text.
title: Could be really nice

author: John Wheeler
comment: This is a great app, it really is, but the weather is way off. At least in my area. Now if He, She or They could integrate the app called Weather Underground into it. It could be awesome. Weather Underground is always right on the nuts, because they use weather stations in your area. Hell. Sometimes in your neighborhood right the street. Swipe to right and get more info. Swipe again and more or just have it open the app. Anyways. Weather Underground is the sht.
title: Nice app. Nice design

author: Christopher Leatham
comment: Its looks great but th gps doesn't work on it. I mean my gps works on my moto 360 but when I run this face it doesnt work :(
title: Good

author: Ivan Froese
comment: Would love if you could add the option to not display the weather in dimmed mode, and only have the time and date visible. Thanks!

author: Brandon Giesel
comment: Please allow GPS to work on watch face using battery saving GPS setting. Thank you and keep up the great work!
title: Feature Request

author: Mike Colmo
comment: Temp had been stuck at 53 for a couple days now
title: Nice but...

author: Andrew Goldstein
comment: A very nice and simple Material Designed face for my watch. Only request would be to add battery level options for phone and watch.
title: Excellent Material Themed Face for my LG G Watch

author: Derrick Hucks
comment: Very simple, info I need, and the colors are great for matching what I'm wearing. Updated rating, weather doesn't always update. Still the best aside from that.
title: Favorite watch face

author: Kristijan Lučić
comment: Very nice and clean watch face, weather info is a huge plus, and the ability to choose the theme color is also great. Keep up the good work!
title: Great!

comment: Doesn't reflect screenshots. Everything is misaligned and off center. Looks like crap.

author: Philipe Landru
comment: Cannot set the app. Got ripped off! Ridiculous!
title: App doesn't work!

author: Amar Rajvanshi
comment: Doesn't display correctly on moto 360 2.
title: Needs update

author: Yves Pelletier
comment: Works great on moto 360 but on asus zenwatch 3 the proportion are off if they fix I would buy again for my new watch

author: Lars F
comment: .. weather textviews are not center aligned vertically on moto 360.
title: Nice and clean watchface, but..

author: Mike Helmick
comment: No matter where I go.. the weather is always 51 and cloudy. It used to work, but I've moved on now.
title: Weather doesn't update

author: Jordan
comment: GPS doesnt work.
title: Moto 360 1stGen

author: Jason Lester
comment: I've tried everything I can think of in the past day to get this face to show on my Urbane with no luck.
title: Doesn't work on the LG Urbane

author: Sam Ra
comment: Design could improve center the time its more to the right.  digital clock could be in one color More color options Weather without gps
title: ok

author: Peter Sanlon
comment: Just what I want for square Sony watch - simple and clean material design. Like it best on dark setting. Well done.
title: Clean and clear

author: Matthew Pearce
comment: It would be even better if there was an option to have the weather centered vertically in the colored accent zone.
title: Great design!

author: Tom Keane
comment: I love the way it's so easy to configure. I've tried hundreds of watch faces. This is by far the best.
title: Clean beautiful design!

author: Michael W
comment: 👏 ( although I would like the option to remove the 2015, I know what year it is and it would make the face a little cleaner :-)
title: Nice.

author: Younghee Kwon
comment: I just wish the weather is placed a bit higher so that notification like email doesn't cover the weather.
title: Good design

author: Dave Whitman
comment: Elegant,  simple and readable.  My one wish: watch battery level should be an option to display.
title: Beautiful watch face

author: Derek Arguello
comment: I love the material design however developer is not good at responding at all.
title: Decent
